item.title: EP 1005 - The Haunted Fridge
item.itunes:title: The Haunted Fridge
item.description:
Today we travel to Pakistan to listen to a tree that sounds like a baby, and then we visit Vietnam to go shopping at the Big C Hải Phòng Mall and find out ghosts love to spend money!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

PayPal Donation Link

https://tinyurl.com/mrxe36ph

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

Dead Rabbit Radio Wiki by Germ

https://deadrabbitradio.pods.monster/doku.php?id=Welcome

 

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

EP 145 - The Hairy Devils Of The Southwest (Floating Screaming Head episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-145-the-hairy-devils-of-the-southwest

Ahmed Ali Akbar Shares Scary Video From Shoot Location #shorts

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vxbk702yZOs&t=24s&ab_channel=EntertainmentGen

Watch: Eerie 'Crying' Tree Filmed in Pakistan

https://www.coasttocoastam.com/article/watch-eerie-crying-tree-filmed-in-pakistan/

Actor Ahmed Ali Akbar shares creepy video of crying tree

https://www.globalvillagespace.com/actor-ahmed-ali-akbar-shares-creepy-video-of-crying-tree/

Trees Make Noises, and Some of Those Sounds Are Cries for Help

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/trees-make-noises-and-some-of-those-sounds-are-cries-for-help-24045073/

What is an Ultrasound?

https://www.news-medical.net/health/What-is-an-Ultrasound.aspx

8 Vietnamese Supernatural Beliefs That’ll Send Shivers Up Your Spine

https://thesmartlocal.com/vietnam/vietnamese-supernatural-beliefs/

Burning Paper Money: A Vietnamese Tet Tradition

https://theculturetrip.com/asia/vietnam/articles/burning-paper-money-a-vietnamese-tet-tradition/

Was a real ghost caught on camera?

https://twitter.com/SigmaMaleDoc/status/1594948681572450304

Guard let the ghost of a deceased patient into the hospice, thinking it was a living person

https://anomalien.com/guard-let-the-ghost-of-a-deceased-patient-into-the-hospice-thinking-it-was-a-living-person/

Watch: Security Guard Filmed Talking to Ghost?

https://www.coasttocoastam.com/article/watch-security-guard-filmed-talking-to-ghost/

 

Listen to the podcast wherever you listen to podcasts!
